required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Protexa速 Versus TiLoopBra速 in Immediate Breast Reconstruction- A Pilot Study
clinical_study.official_title: Protexa速 Versus TiLoopBra速 in Immediate Breast Reconstruction- A Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: Randomized controlled trial to look at early complications, cosmetic outcome, patient satisfaction and thickness of the tissue overlying the implant at the lower pole in immediate implant based breast reconstruction after Skin or Nipple Sparing Mastectomy with either a mesh (TiLOOP Bra) or an ADM (Protexa). Multicenter austrian trial with four breast cancer centers, 50 patients randomized 1:1 in the TiLoop or Protexa group.

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to two weeks after surgery
primary_outcome.description: hematoma, seroma, infection, skin necrosis, capsular contracture, implant loss

primary_outcome.measure: change of baseline patient quality of life after 3 and 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to two weeks after surgery (=baseline), 3 and 6 months after surgery

primary_outcome.measure: change of baseline cosmetic outcome after 3 and 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to two weeks after surgery (=baseline), 3 and 6 months after surgery

primary_outcome.measure: change of baseline thickness of the tissue overlying the implant at the lower pole after 3 and 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to two weeks after surgery (=baseline), 3 and 6 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: The thickness of the tissue covering the implant in the lower pole im mm measured by ultrasound
hematoma, seroma, infection, skin necrosis, capsular contracture, implant loss
hematoma, seroma, infection, skin necrosis, capsular contracture, implant loss

clinical_study.condition: Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome

arm_group.description: immediate breast reconstruction with an implant and TiLoop Bra
immediate breast reconstruction with an implant and Protexa

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- breast cancer patients with indication for skin or nipple sparing mastectomy
- BRCA1/2 mutation carriers with indication for skin or nipple sparing mastectomy
Exclusion Criteria:
- prior local radiotherapy
- inflammatory breast cancer

condition_browse.mesh_term: Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome
